title: Mercury Releases to Air, North America, 2004
name: Mercury Releases to Air, North America, 2004
description: Industrial releases of mercury to air in 2004 for Canada, US, and Mexico for facilities with >100 kg emissions to air. Canada data source is NPRI, US data source is TRI, Mexico data source is NPRI and CEC's North American Power Plant Air Emissions report.
